definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Six types of cooker are being piloted in Indian villages.
sentences.chinese: 在印度的村莊正在試驗6種類型的炊具。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a silencing device applied in the electrical heating cooker, including an electrical heating cooker body.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種應用在電加熱炊具中的消音裝置。

sentences.english: But you have to be careful while using and washing non-stick cookware.
sentences.chinese: 但是你必須小心使用和洗衣機不粘炊具。

sentences.english: You don't need to spend hundreds of dollars on state-of-the-art cookware .
sentences.chinese: 您不需要花費數百美元的國家，最先進的炊具。

sentences.english: This product is an inside cookware made of a pan, and a dome lid.
sentences.chinese: 該產品是在炊具一個泛製成，和一個圓頂蓋。

sentences.english: Don't use steel utensils on Teflon cookware.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用特富龍炊具餐具鋼。

sentences.english: She says she wanted to make a solar cooker with materials that are easily available, even in remote villages.
sentences.chinese: 德維說她想要用身邊的材料來製作這個太陽能炊具。

sentences.english: These helpful tips to take care of copper pots and cooking utensils to keep shining.
sentences.chinese: 銅鍋照顧這些方便的技巧和保持炊具閃閃發光。

sentences.english: I am in the process of finishing up the engineering design for a Kitchen cookware.
sentences.chinese: 我在結束了對廚房炊具工程設計過程。

sentences.english: Scouring out the pots and pans often took them a lot of time.
sentences.chinese: 擦乾淨炊具常要花費他們許多時間。

sentences.english: Any of the following items come in enameled cast iron
sentences.chinese: 下面要介紹的這些炊具都是用搪瓷鑄鐵做成的。

sentences.english: Here's an analogy from the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 這裏用炊具做了一個類比。

sentences.english: Solar cookers, or ovens, have been used for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能炊具或爐具早已使用了幾個世紀。

sentences.english: Such cookware is good for deep-frying and slow cooking.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的炊具是好的深油炸和緩慢的烹製過程。

sentences.english: Fire up the BBQ to grill the calories in your meat.
sentences.chinese: 開啓烤肉炊具來烤乾肉上的熱量。

definition: portable gas stove (fueled by a gas cartridge)
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
to make a fire/to light a fire
